thread.section_title: Adria Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good and not so good
thread.title_full: Good and not so good - Review of Adria Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

title: Good and not so good
text: We stayed for 6 nights. Mom and two teenage sons. The location is ideal. Quick walk to the tube with multiple lines. Safe neighborhood. Plenty of shops and restaurants close by. Small efficient room with three single very firm beds. Very clean with basic amenities. The downside - front facing rooms with lots of street noise. If you're a light sleeper it can be tough.
